name: Five Keys to Exit
summary:
A mighty sorcerer cursed your land, you are trapped inside your own home!

The terms of the Mighty Sorcerer are simple:
1. Get Five Keys
2. Talk to him
3. Cancel the curse

Tips:
By playing you will unlock achievements, they are good, very good for you!
Explore the Shop and Incursions, be careful thought, incursions can get your army killed.
